trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Roseville
There were no other sightings in Roseville on or around January 15th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsme and my friend were hanging out at a place we like to call "the spot" its a business street that ends in a court with a bike trail attatched to it and we were hanging at this business just up the street a little and after he said he had to go so he dropped me off at my car that was parked at the court near the bike trail and i got inide turned it on sat for just a minute or two to let it warm up and my friend left. so by myself noone around and approxamately little after 12 maybe close to 12:10 a.m and i put my car into gear started to make the u turn to leave and as im turn about half way through the turn i look into the sky above a building and in that second i saw a star like light bigger then a star and blue like an LED light come from nowhere it seems like and went straight up and dissapeared in a single second maybe less. from my point of view in my car if i held my hand up to the spot in the sky where it happened it would have only been a fore finger length long it traveled. then as i drove away i felt such unnatural fear in my body for no reason at all and i was concious of me being scared and couldnt realize why it was just not normal at all. as soon as i saw it i did think that it was a ufo purely because i know that kinda thing doesnt happen often especially in my town all we got is helicopters here. but even through my fear i drove home and just went to sleep.
